sentence.Network_en: Texas annual with coarsely pinnatifid leaves; cultivated for its showy radiate yellow flower heads.
sentence.Network_cn: 产自得克萨斯州的一年生草本植物,叶子呈羽状半裂; 栽培以供观赏其艳丽的、呈辐射状的黄色头状花序.

PerfectNetExp.abs: pinnate leaf 羽状叶pinnatifid 羽状半裂的pinnula 小羽片
3. 篦齿状的羽状分裂的pinnatifid羽状的pinnate
Leaves alternate , entire to pinnatifid , with small , glandular stipules ., 叶互生 , 全缘的到羽状半裂 , 具小 , 具腺的托叶.
widely distributed fern of tropical southern hemisphere having leathery pinnatifid fronds ., 具有坚韧羽状复叶的广泛分布在南半球热带地区的一种蕨类.

list.abs: a dainty South American annual having deeply pinnatifid leaves and racemes of fringed almond-scented purple-white flowers .南美一种非常考究的一年生植物，开紫白色花，略带杏香的花序，羽状叶片。

perennial of southwestern United States having leathery blue-green pinnatifid leaves and thick plumelike spikes of yellow flowers ; sometimes placed in genus Cleome .美国西南部的一种多年生草本植物，有革质的、蓝绿色羽状叶和浓密的、羽毛状黄色花穗。
羽状浅裂(shallowly pinnatifid)：通常指裂缝深度超过1/2的。　最末裂片（或最末小羽片）(ultimate segment)：指复叶最末一回的羽片 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from modern Latin pinnatifidus, from Latin pinnatus 'feathered' + fid- 'cleft' (from the verb findere)

means.word_mean: 1. of a leaf shape; cleft nearly to the midrib in broad divisions not separated into distinct leaflets
